name: kurumsal-prosedur-asistani
description: AI destekli kurumsal prosedür soru-cevap sistemi

scripts.install-backend: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install emergentintegrations --extra-index-url https://d33sy5i8bnduwe.cloudfront.net/simple/
scripts.setup: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.start-backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn server:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001 --reload
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Build completed. Deploy build folder to your hosting service.'

author: KPA Team
